Mr. ROSE. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize a true American  treasure that I have the privilege to represent in Congress. This year  marks 100 years since the Grand Ole Opry first introduced audiences  around the world to country music and to Nashville.

My home state of Tennessee is known for many things. If you had to  list some of the most prominent,…
